Articles.Content:
Hello

Can someone post a pic of properly set Docking Clamp Sr.? I keep having problems with docking port orientation, and I don't know which side is which.

Thanks.

Edited June 4, 2013 by HammerHead90

Just compare it visually to the normal size docking port. Hint: Look for the handle.

If that somehow fails, then build and launch two of the same rover with a port facing each way, then try A-A, A-B, B-B. Should only take a few minutes.

http://oi42.tinypic.com/2hnmlu0.jpg

Like so^

The part which should dock against another port is facing up.
Yep, that's what I asked for. Thanks.
